song.title: Tobe!Gundam
song.lyrics: Moeagare</br>Moeagare</br>Moeaagre GANDAMU!</br>Kimi yo hashire</br>Mada ikari ni moeru</br>Toshi ga aru nara</br>Kyodai na teki o</br>Uteyo, uteyo, uteyo</br>Seigi no ikari o</br>Butsukero GANDAMU</br>Kido senshi GANDAMU! GANDAMU!</br></br>Yomigaeru</br>Yomigaeru</br>Yomigaeru GANDAMU!</br>Kimi yo tsukame</br>Ginga e mukatte</br>Tobeyo GANDAMU</br>Kido senshi GANDAMU! GANDAMU!</br>

song.title: Sora no Tamoto
song.lyrics: kieyuku hoshi no kakera wa chiri</br>mune ni yoseru chishio ni</br>mimi wo sumashiteiru</br>aogimita haruka na yume wa hikari</br>arishi hi no bokura ga hitotsu datta akashi</br></br>nani wo utsusu...</br>kegarenaki akai shirushi</br></br>tooi sekai kimi wa kanashimi koete</br>tabidatsu yo</br>sono te ni amaru sadame ni mezamete wa</br></br>hikari tadoru</br>shirube wa nai</br>

song.title: Yume Wadachi
song.lyrics: yume hanatsu tōki sora ni kimi no haru wa chitta</br>saihate no kono chi ni hibiki watatta</br></br>atedo naku samayo eru itoshi sayo</br>kono mune o inuku hikari to nare</br></br>kanashimi no chizu nara Amata kaze ni chitte</br>yue naki hibi no kizu mo matataku kanata yo</br></br>owaranu yume wadachi ni kimi no kage yureta</br>

song.title: The Eagle Swoops Down
song.lyrics: no lyrics

song.title: Arashi no Naka de Kagayaite
song.lyrics: Arashi no nakade kagayaite, sono yume o akiramenai de</br>Kizutsuita, anata no senaka no</br>Tenshi no hane, sotto daite</br>Daite agetai</br></br>Aoku hatenai, sora no katasumi de</br>Umareta yume ga, ima chiisa kutemo</br></br>Koori tsuku youna, tsuyoi kaze de sae</br>Sono mune ni kagayaku, yume o keshita ri</br>Souyo, keshita ri nante dekinai</br></br>Arashi no nakade kagayaite, sono yume o akiramenai de</br>Kizutsuita, anata no senaka no</br>Tenshi no hane, sotto daite</br>Daite agetai</br>

song.title: Itsuka sora ni Todoite
song.lyrics: CAN'T YOU SEE </br>THAT YOU'RE FREE?</br>OH, LET ME LOVE YOU SO</br></br>Miageru sora wa tooi kedo</br>Kakaekirenai yume ga aru</br>Sou yo, tsukurareta sekai no naka wo</br>Nukedashite jiyuu ni naritai</br></br>Hashiritsuzukete</br>Sora ni todokeba</br>Kaze ni nareru to</br>Sou shinjiteru kara</br>I NEVER GIVE UP FOREVER</br>

song.title: The Winner
song.lyrics: shourisha nado inai tatakai ni tsukare-hate</br>hoshizora o mi-ageru naku koto mo kanawanai</br>I don't need kinou nado iranai</br>I don't need kuchi-hateta yume mo</br></br>I got a burnin' heart</br>mune o tsuranuku SURIRU wo tada oi-kakete hashiri-tsuzuketai</br></br>kotoba ni dekinai omoi ga</br>kogoeta kokoro sae atsuku saseru</br></br>I got a burnin' love</br>aoku kagayaku honoo de kono hoshizora o ooi-tsukusu toki made</br>I got a burnin' heart</br>ai wa kodoku-na tatakai kono sekai made moyashi-tsukusu no ka</br>

song.title: Men Of Destiny
song.lyrics: Aozameta hitomi mitsumeru honoo</br>Ima subete wo suteru toki ga kita</br>Omoidasu koto mo kanashimu koto mo</br>Yurusarezu ni tatakai tsuzukeru</br></br>Kyou de inochi ga moetsukiru to shite mo</br>Soredemo hito wa asu wo yumemiru mono ka</br>Sore ga sadame demo</br>"I WANNA GET A CHANCE"</br></br>Zetsubou no sora ni fukiareru arashi</br>Mirai wa dare no tame ni aru</br>Horobiyuku sekai kakenukeru arashi</br>Erabareshi mono MEN OF DESTINY</br>

song.title: Zeta.Toki o Koete
song.lyrics: Ima wa ugokenai sore ga sadame dakedo</br>Akirame wa shinai mou mezameta kara</br>Moeru tokimeki wa jidai wo utsushi</br>Iroazayaka ni moesakaru honoo</br></br>Crying ima wa mienaku tomo</br>Searching michishirube wa ukabu</br></br>I wanna have a pure time</br>Everyone's a noble mind</br></br>Soko ni nokotta wakasa toridashi</br>Believing a sign of Z</br>beyond the hard times from now</br></br>Kawaku kuchibiru nureteiru nara</br>Toki wo norikoe atsui jidai e to</br>Utsuru darou to shinjiteiru kara</br>Believing a sign of Z</br>beyond the hard times from now</br>

song.title: Mizu no Hoshi e Ai wo Komete
song.lyrics: Aoku nemuru mizu no hoshi ni sotto</br>Kuchizuke shite inochi no hi wo tomosu hito yo</br>Toki to iu kin'iro no sazanami wa</br>Oozora no kuchibiru ni umareta toiki ne</br></br>Kokoro ni uzumoreta yasashisa no hoshi-tachi ga</br>Honoo age yobiau…</br>Namima sasurau nanpasen no you ni</br></br>Mou nakanaide</br>Ima anata wo sagashiteru hito ga iru kara</br>Omae ni aitai yo to</br>

song.title: Zeta no Kodou~Zeta Gundam
song.lyrics: no lyrics

song.title: Metamorphose
song.lyrics: Yureru kodou ga boku wo shibaritsukeru</br>Kimi no kakera ga fukai yami ni ochita</br>Nigeru koto sae yurusarenai sekai de</br>Kimi no koto dake wa mamoritakatta noni</br></br>Imamo ima demo dareka no yasashii kotoba yori</br>Kimi no kimi dake no kuchibiru ni sotto furetai</br></br>Hateshinai kono sora mo itsuka wa owari wo tsugeru</br>Kono me ni yakitsuite kimi wo wasure wa shinai</br></br>Imamo ima demo dareka no yasashii kotoba yori</br>Kimi wo kono ude de mou ichido dakishimetai</br></br>Imamo kimi no tame boku wa tatakai tsuzukeru yo</br>Kimi to mou ichido waraiaaru aa sono hi made</br>

song.title: Silent Voice
song.lyrics: hoshi ga furishikiru PENTOHAUSU de</br>sora no ORUGO-RU hitori kiiteta</br></br>GARASU no RO-PU wo mekakushi de wataru</br>minna sabishii SA-KASU no kodomo sa</br></br>hitori bocchi no kanashimi ni</br>kishinda tsuna ga kokoro de yureteru...</br></br>SILENT VOICE, SILENT VOICE</br>yasashii me wo shita dareka ni aitai</br>SILENT EYES, SILENT EYES</br>sasayaite kureyo soba ni iruyotte...</br>SAIRENTO VOISU</br>

song.title: Into the Sky
song.lyrics: Do you feel alone ?</br>Can you hear me now ?</br>Your mind is so far away still on earth</br>Many times you are hurting yourself</br>You can't be just a life on the shelf</br>It's only you that can fly this new unicorn</br>Into the sky</br></br>And it's every time, you hurt yourself with knives</br>And I'm calling, calling out your name again</br>If you're holding, holding onto fear I knew</br>The blind can open, let light shine through</br></br>And I say</br>Why we can't stop all this sacrifice ?</br>I know that all the lies became the stone in your heart</br>I wonder how long you gonna survive</br>We didn't see all it's meaning</br>

song.title: Stand Up To The Victory
song.lyrics: hageshii ame ga kokoro o fuwaseru</br>ano hi no youni</br>tada hashiri nuketa</br>kinou made no My dream</br>shinjite iru no sa</br>owari no nai Defense demo ii yo</br>kimi ga boku o mitsume tsuzukete kureru nara</br></br>Stand up to the Victory</br>ikutsu mono asa o mukae</br>itsuka kitto tsukande miseru</br>Stand up to the Victory</br>sono mukou gawa ni</br>nani mo nakute mo kamawanai kara</br>kakegae no nai</br>kimi no yasashii egao daite</br>

song.title: Don't Stop! Carry On!
song.lyrics: Kurushimi shika mienakute</br>Utsuro ni tada sugita hibi</br></br>Down na kimochi ga tsuzuku machi de</br>Kimi dake yasashiku kagayaiteru</br></br>Don't Stop!   Carry On!</br>Akiramenai</br>Don't Stop!   Shinin' On!</br>Kowasarenai</br>Ai ni naru yo   Sora wo tsutsumu you ni</br>Dakishimete iru</br>Dakishimete iru</br>

song.title: Flying in the Sky
song.lyrics: FLYING IN THE SKY</br>Takaku habatake oozora wo dokomademo</br>SHINING FINGER</br>Kagayaku hikari ga chi no hate terashi</br>Kiseki wo yobu SPELL</br></br>Furimukazu aruku no sa</br>Mugen no chikara ga aru</br>Nando demo tamesu no sa</br>Donna ni kushiku demo yari togeru</br>(G Gandamu)</br></br>Ai wa itsumo kono mune ni</br>Towa ni kieru koto wa nai</br>Kono te ga sakende iru</br>Ashite e to hashire</br></br>FLYING IN THE SKY</br>Kimi ga egaita mirai e no shinario wa</br>SHINING FINGER</br>Yume wo tsukamou subete wa omou mama ni</br>I GET A CHANCE!</br>

song.title: Trust You Forever
song.lyrics: Tsuka no ma no yasuragi mo furi kitte</br>Hitasura massugu ni hashiri tsuduketa</br>Nagareru ase Nuguwazuni</br></br>Butsukaru koto de fukaku Musubitsuku yuujou</br>Kizutsuita koto wa Muda jana katta ne</br></br>Kanashimi ni kureta toki Sotto te o sashi nobete miyou</br>Kitto itsumademo tomo wa You'll be friends Kimi o mimamotte iru</br></br>Hitori janai kara so long time Chikaiaou kitto</br>itsuka jidai ga kawatte mo boku wa wasure nai I trust you forever</br>We'll look honest world</br>

song.title: JUST COMMUNICATION
song.lyrics: Just wild beat communication</br>Ame ni utare nagara</br>Iroasenai atsui omoi</br>Karada juu de tsutaetai yo tonight !</br></br>Nureta sono kata wo</br>Atatameru you ni daita</br>Furueteru yubisaki wa</br>Nani wo motomesama you no ?</br>Anata no manazashi mamoritai</br>Kanashimi tsuyosa ni</br>Kaeru ai wo shinjite</br></br>Just wild beat communication</br>Ame ni utare nagara</br>Iroasenai atsui omoi</br>Karada juu de tsutaetai yo tonight !</br>

song.title: RHYTHM EMOTION
song.lyrics: I just feel "Rhythm Emotion"</br>Kono mune no kodou wa</br>Anata e to tsudzuiteru so far away...</br></br>Mou kizutsuite mo ii</br>Hitomi wo sorasazu ni</br>Atsuku hageshiku ikite itai</br></br>Akiramenai tsuyosa wo kureru anata dakara dakishimetai</br></br>I just feel "Rhythm Emotion"</br>Ayamachi mo itami mo</br>Azayaka na isshun no hikari e to michibiete</br>I just feel "Rhythm Emotion"</br>Kono mune no kodou wa</br>Anata e to tsudzuiteru so far away</br>

song.title: DREAMS
song.lyrics: Wasurekaketa yume ga ima ugokidasu</br>Mune no sukima</br>Sukoshizutsu umeru yo ni</br></br>Kooritsuita kioku ga mezameru shunkan</br>Hajimaru mirai dake wo ima negau</br></br>Itsuka mita ano yume wo</br>Ryote de dakishimete</br>Hanasazu akiramezu ni</br>Shinjitsuzuketai</br>Itsuka mita ano yume wo</br>Kono te ni tsukamu made</br>Omoi wo wasurenai de</br>Oitsuzukete yukitai kara</br>

song.title: RESOLUTION
song.lyrics: Kowareyasui negai dake naze konna ni arun darou</br>Yoake ni fuku kaze no iro machi wo yasashiku kaeru</br></br>Itsudatte hontou wa sagashi-tsuzuketeita</br>Massugu ni mitsumeru koto kowagatteita</br>Anata ga iru kara arukidaseru ashita e</br>Donna toki mo osorenai de</br></br>"Onaji yume ga aru" sono kagayaki no naka e</br>Sukoshizutsu chikazuite yuku nido to mayowanai de</br>

song.title: Turn A Turn
song.lyrics: TAAN A TAAN TAAN A TAAN TAAN A</br></br>Toki ga mirai ni susumu to dare ga kimeta nda</br>Rakuin wo kesu inochi ga rekishi wo kakinaosu</br></br>Utsukushii tsurugi wa hito to hito tsunagete</br>Meguri kuru setsunasa kanashimi wo aratte</br></br>Anata to no aida ni inochi aru katachi wo</br>Kono hoshi ni sasageru ai to iu shirushi de</br></br>TAAN A TAAN TAAN A TAAN TAAN A</br>TAAN A TAAN TAAN A TAAN TAAN A</br>

song.title: Century Color
song.lyrics: Century Color Million Color</br></br>kuri kaesu kisetsu-tachi ga kokoro to karada wo aratte kureru</br>anata no naka ni aru kizu kuchi wo itawari fukaku iyashi ai nagara</br></br>honno chiisana TSUBOMI     futari de sodateru</br>ai dake de ii zutto...</br></br>soshite akai akai hanabira ga [Uh..Century Color]</br>aoi aoi hane ni naru [Uh..Million Color]</br></br>anata ni te no nukumori shinjite naite naite yume tsumei deita</br>umare kawareru made...</br></br>Na Na Na Century Color</br>Na Na Na Million Color</br></br>TURNS!!!</br>

song.title: INVOKE
song.lyrics: Surechigai isogu tabi ni butsukeai chigireau</br>Tagai no hane no itami kanjiteiru</br></br>Sabishisa ni yogoreta ude de daita</br>Sore igai no nanika wo shiranai kara</br></br>Tsunagaru shunkan mezameru eien machikogareru</br></br>Hayasugiru toki no mabataki ni sarasarete</br>Hitori de wa todokanai</br>Negai nante kiesou na kotoba ja</br></br>Karami-au netsu no tsutai shinjitsu wo</br>Dare kara mamoreba ii ?</br>Kimi ga itsuka hoshigatta omoi ga</br>Soko ni aru nara…</br>

song.title: Moment
song.lyrics: Daremo mina samayoi nagara kotae wo sagashite…</br></br>Futari naraba jikan sae mo shihai dekiru to omotteta ano koro</br>Tsukihi wa nagare sora no iro mo kawaru you ni surechigatteta kokoro</br>(One moment in this time. Baby I'm worried)</br></br>Meguri kuru kisetsu no naka de</br>Ano toki ga tomareba ii no ni</br>Futari mada samayoi nagara</br>Kono sora no kanata ni ai wo sagashite…</br>

song.title: Believe
song.lyrics: Kotoba mitsukerarezu omowazu fureta katasaki</br>Kimi wa nanimo iwazu ni tsumetaku furihodoku</br>Honno sasai na gokai kara osanai ai wa kuzureteku</br>Sonna kanashii kao mitakunai</br></br>Yume sae nakushite mo sono hohoemi dake sutenaide kono mune kagayaiteite</br></br>Itsuka chikau bokura kono te de kizuku mirai wa</br>Kanarazu kono basho de kimi ga doko ni itta tte</br>Dakedo ima wa futari setsunaku sorashita hitomi</br>Deaeru koto wo shinjite</br>

song.title: Realize
song.lyrics: Tadoritsuku basho sae mo wakaranai</br>Todoku to shinjite ima omoi wo hashiraseru yo</br></br>Katachi kaeteyuku kokoro mo kono machi mo</br>Dakedo kienai negai ga aru</br></br>Chigau yume wo mite onaji sora nagameta</br>Ano hi chikatta "makenai koto"</br></br>Zutto futari kono te tsunagezu ni</br>Umaretekita imi wo sagashiteta</br></br>Tadoritsuku basho sae mo wakaranai</br>Todoku to shinjite ima omoi wo hashiraseru yo</br>Ayamachi mo setsunasa mo koeru toki</br>Negai ga hikari dakishimeru</br>Mirai wo yobisamashite</br>

song.title: ignited
song.lyrics: Yasashii sono yubi ga owari ni fureru toki</br>Ima dake kimi dake shinjite mo iin darou ?</br></br>Dare mo ga kuzureteku negai wo motome sugite</br>Jibun ga ochiteyuku basho wo sagashiteru</br></br>Kizutsukete yureru shika dekinai zawameku omoi ga bokura no shinjitsu nara</br></br>Kowareau kara ugokenai</br>Sabishii ame kasanete</br></br>Deau hikari no nai jidai no</br>Mabushisa dake</br></br>Kawareru chikara osorenai</br>Fukai kodou no saki ni</br></br>Kawasu honoo yo egakareta</br>Unmei ni todoke</br>

song.title: PRIDE
song.lyrics: Hakanaku chitta hikari ga bokura wo ima yobisamasu</br>Kanashimi wa oto wo tate kieru ano basho kara</br></br>Ikuzo wake up to go michinaru mirai e</br>Saa fuan PURASU PRIDE mune ni fly</br></br>Fukaku ai suru yuuki to kibou tsuyoku kanjiru kono kioku ga</br>Karamiau kokoro to kokoro wo tsunaide ugokidashiteiru</br></br>Kagayaku hikari ga terashi bokura wo ima yobiokosu</br>Hibikiau oto wo tate kizamu kono basho kara</br>Towa ni shinjitsuzukete…</br>

song.title: Bokutachi no Yukue
song.lyrics: Bokutachi wa mayoi nagara</br>Tadoritsuku basho wo sagashi tsuzuke</br>Kanashikute namida nagashite mo</br>Itsuka kagayaki ni kaete…</br></br>Tozashita kako ga ima mune wo yusaburu kara</br>Motomeru hodo tooku okizari no kokoro</br>Bokura wa ikiru hodo nanika wo ushinatte</br>Soredemo ashita e no yume wo sutetakunai</br></br>Kanashimi no riyuu de sae mo tsuyoku dakishimeteitai</br>Toori sugita kisetsu no sono saki ni nani ga aru no darou</br></br>Bokutachi wa mayoi nagara</br>Tadoritsuku basho wo sagashi tsuzuke</br>Kanashikute namida nagashite mo</br>Itsuka kagayaki ni kaete</br>'Cause I'm Never Gonna Stop Streakin' My Dream</br>

song.title: Wings of Words
song.lyrics: Sora wa tobenai kedo</br>Tsubasa nara aru no sa</br></br>Nagusame nagara fukinshin dakedo</br>Naiteru kao mo kirei de aseru yo</br>Kujikezu yume wo miru koto wa jibun to tatakatteru koto</br>Higoto ni fueru surikizu wo jiman shite mo ii kurai sa</br></br>Sora wa tobenai kedo tsubasa nara ageyou</br>Sore wa mou hitori janai to kimi no kodoku hagasu kotoba</br>Donna peshimisuto mo koi wo shite kawaru</br>Eranda michi ga moshi ikidomari nara soko de mayoeba ii</br>

song.title: vestige
song.lyrics: Nigitta kobushi no tsuyosa de kudaketa</br>Negai ni chi wo nagasu tenohira</br></br>Hatenai tsubasa to kusari wa yoku nite</br>Omosa de doko ni mo ikezu ni</br></br>Nakusu bakari no osanai hitomi de</br>Hito wa kaeranu hoshi wo omou</br></br>Kakageta sorezore no hi wo</br>Inochi to sakasete</br>Hakonde yuku koto ga unmei</br>Kagayaki kizamu daremo ga yasashii toki no kizuato</br>

song.title: DAYBREAK'S BELL
song.lyrics: Nee konna katachi no deai shika nakatta no ? Kanashii ne</br>Anata ni shinde mo ayamete hoshiku mo nai… Onegai</br></br>Unmei sae nomikomare shizumisou na umi e to</br></br>Negai yo kaze ni notte yoake no kane wo narase yo</br>Tori no you ni My wishes over their airspace.</br>Musuu no nami wo koe asu e tachimukau anata wo mamoritamae</br>My life I trade it for your pain.</br></br>Furimukazu habatake kono omoi wo hakonde ano sora wo tondeku</br></br>Mirai wa dare ni mo uchiotosenai</br>

song.title: Ash Like Snow
song.lyrics: Sora akaku someru kokutan no yami</br>Nomikomareta hoshikuzu-tachi</br>Hakanaku furitsumoru hai no yuki</br></br>Mitsumeta nageki no mado</br>I never dreamed</br>Kooritsuku</br>There… I come for you</br></br>Omoi wa sekibaku no yozora ni</br>Maiagari kudaketa</br>Kono sekai ga katachi wo kaeru tabi ni</br>Mamoritai mono wo</br>Kowashite shimatteita nda</br>

song.title: Hakanaku mo Towa no Kanashi
song.lyrics: Ai ga ai wo omosugiru tte rikai wo kobami</br>Nikushimi ni kawatteiku mae ni</br></br>Nani mo kamo sou darou</br>Batsu no warui jijou ni wa itsumo futashite</br>Kuwase mono no riaru</br>Yuganda jirenma daite</br>Yakusaku shita hazu no futari sae</br>Kizukazu toorisugite yuku</br></br>Kowashiatte wakariatteta kokoro okizari ni shita</br>Kore ga nare no hate na no</br>Mitomenai de tachimukatta toki mo</br>Ochiteku toki no imeeji kara nigedasezu ni</br>Ah nando demo sagashidasu yo</br>Kimi no me sono te no nukumori wo</br></br>Ai wa itsumo atashii wo kizutsukeru dake tte kimi wa tsubuyaite</br>Shinjiru koto ga kowakute naitandarou</br>Yowasa wo shitte tsuyoku nare</br>Osorezu shinjiru koto de</br>Hontou no ai wo shiru no darou</br>

song.title: Namida no Mukou
song.lyrics: Dareka wo kanashimasete made waraenakute mo</br>Sou itte kanojo wa utsumuitetan da yoru ni naita</br></br>Tsumetaku haritsuite kogoeteiru</br>Furitsuzuku genjitsu ni kasa nado nai</br>Ikiteyuku koto ga tatakai nante</br>Sonna riyuu dake de tojikomerareta</br>My Heart, My Story</br></br>Namida no mukou ga mieru no kagayaiteiru</br>Chiisana mado ni wa ano koro mitai ni aoi sora ga utsuru</br>Aa tori no youni tobe wa shinai kedo</br></br>Dareka wo kanashimaseta toki kanjiru itami</br>Wasurenai you ni sotto me wo tojite naita</br>

song.title: Tozasareta Sekai
song.lyrics: Akaku nureta yubisaki de sai wa furare</br>Sora e ochite yuku fukaku fukaku</br>Nidoto kaerenai yami no kanata e</br></br>Kasoku shite yuku RASUTO SHIIN wa</br>Dare ni mo tomerarenai</br></br>Unmei wo kiri hirake</br>Kizutsuita tsubasa hiroge tobitatsu yo</br>Kotae wa koko ni wa nai kara</br>Ta ga tame ni kane wa naru ?</br>Zetsubou ni michita tozasareta sekai</br>Habataki tsuzukeru kasukana hikari e to</br>

song.title: Asu e
song.lyrics: Bokura ga miageta ashita no taiyou sora no kumo kotte furisosoida</br>Kokoro no sukima wo neratte tsukisasaru uta</br>Tometeita jikan ga ugokidashite kibou no hikari ni mukau michi wa</br>Machigai ja nai to jibun de kimeta nda</br></br>Hiraiteiku ten no mado kara sasu you na mune no itami mabushisugiru hodo</br></br>Shinka suru hibi shinka suru uta wa</br>Haseru haseru haseru haseru</br>Sabinai you ni</br>Owari no nai owari no nai</br>Asu e asu e asu e asu e</br>Mou hashitteiru</br>

song.title: sharp ♯
song.lyrics: Ai ja nai sawarenai</br>Tada hakanai negai deshita</br>Kimi dake sore dake</br>Mitsumeteita hikari deshita</br></br>Ima unmei wo hamidashite</br>SUTOROBO no toki ga kimi wo sarau mae ni sa</br>Motto hayaku kakenuketeyuku</br>Ano hoshi ni naritai</br></br>Maboroshi demo ii</br>Oikakete chiri ni naru made</br></br>Ima ginga wo matataite</br>MONOKURO no yume ga boku wa sasou mae ni sa</br>Kon'ya mayowazu ni mune wo saku</br>Ano hoshi ni naritai</br>

song.title: REAL
song.lyrics: Todokasete kono mune ni</br>Kasuka ni nokoru kimi no koe wo</br>Yume ja nai genjitsu de</br>Samayoi tsuzuketeta</br></br>Tachidomaru no mo mae ni susumu koto mo</br>Atozusari na ki ga shiteta</br>Tojikomerareta shikakui sora no shita</br>Iki wo hisometeta</br></br>Tsumetai hoho wo tsutawaru kako no yowasa nugutte</br>Hikari sasu basho he kono te wo nobasu yo</br></br>Todokasete kono mune ni</br>Kasuka ni nokoru kimi no koe wo</br>Yume ja nai genjitsu de</br>Sagashi tsuzuketeru</br></br>Todokaseru sono mune ni</br>Tashika na omoi boku no koe wo</br>Owaranai genjitsu de</br>Sakebi tsuzuketeiku</br>Ashita wo shinjite</br>

song.title: AURORA
song.lyrics: Haruka na sora samayoeru hikari datte kono michi wo hashiri tsuzukeru</br></br>Aa sekai wa dou shite konna ni mo futashika na yume wo utsushiteru no</br>Sou kurayami no naka de mogaiteru kotoba naki hitomi ga sayonara tsugeta</br></br>Yabureta kumo no sukima ochiteyuku hoshi-tachi tamerai wo keshisareta nara</br></br>Haruka na sora samayoeru hikari datte</br>Ato ichibyou ippo saki ni mitsukedashite miseru kara</br>Tsuki ga terasu tashika na omoi nara kitto</br>Ashita made te ga todoku kara kono michi wo hashiri tsuzukeru</br>

song.title: BLAZING
song.lyrics: Me ga kuramu hodo ni mabushikatta</br>Hajimari wa totsuzen arashi ni naru</br>Suiyoserareteku kimi no hitomi</br>Hajimete kanjita shoudou</br></br>Zenbu kokoro nozoite mite kureru</br>Mada mita koto no nai hontou no kokoro wo oshiete yo</br></br>Ikutsumo no hoshi no namae shitte kimi to boku wa deatta osanai hi</br>Sora miagete wa inotteta boku wa tobu</br>Kono mune ni umareta omoi chikara ni kawaru</br>Kimi to nara dokomademo ikeru mirai michibiku hikari ni nareru</br>

song.title: Futari no Mahō
song.lyrics: Futari ga tooku natte mo</br>Ano hi ga tooku natte mo</br></br>Wasurerarenai</br>Kietari mo shinai</br>Dakitsuite naite waratta</br>Nukumori ga aru kara…</br></br>Dakishimeau tte mahou</br>Watashi no yuuki no basho</br>Nando datte umarekawaru</br></br>Yume ni nageku jidai ga</br>Watashi wo tamesu kedo</br>Hitori ja nai watashi wa</br></br>Machigawanai you ni</br>Koukai shinai you ni</br>Massugu ikite itai kedo</br></br>Arukidasu yuuki mo</br>Tachidomaru yuuki mo</br>Mirai e no jouken… Kitto</br>

song.title: Nibun no Ichi
song.lyrics: "Hitori ja nai" bokura tsunagatteru kara</br>Asu he to fumidashitaku natta nda</br>Sorezore no yume no iro wo tsunaide</br>Kono sora ni azayaka na niji wo kakeyou !</br></br>Kore to itte torie mo nai</br>Rettou kan to aruite jishin datte nai</br>"Tte yuuka sore de tanoshii no ?" tte</br>Kimi wa waratte boku wo oikoshiteku...</br></br>Kokoro no naka de hito ni naru to Flash back !</br>Nara shinkuro sasete Mash up !</br>Kimi to nara dekisou sa Right now !</br>Ready set go !!</br></br>"Hitori ja nai" tte omoeta toki kara</br>Kanaerare sou na ki ga shita nda</br>Kawaranai itsumo no egao no mama de</br>Kimi wa boku no te wo tsukande</br></br>"Futari nara" fukanou nante nai sa</br>Sou omoeta no wa kimi ga ita kara</br>Boku ni nai tsuyosa to kimi ga mottenai</br>Chikara wo kasanete tobitatsu yo</br></br>Tachidomaru na Don't stop !</br>Soba ni iru kara Don't cry !</br>Kimi wa mou hitori ja nai !</br>Everything's gonna be alright !!</br>

song.title: wimp
song.lyrics: Tsuyogari no uragawa ni yowasa wo kakushiteta</br>Nigenai yo, kore kara wa... Mou ichido ano sora e !!</br></br>Tsukuri agete mo kowashite, mata tsukutte,</br>Nanbyaku kai mo again and again !</br>Demo makeru itami ni nare sugiteta</br>Mitomeraretakute, karamawatte, tsuyogari miseta tokoro de sore ja,</br>jibun ga munashiku naru dake ja nai ?</br></br>Uh ikou ka ! It’s time to wake up !</br>Me wo samashina ! Tsuyosa wa meikaku</br>Sadame nante kowase fight for yourself !</br>Me wo sorasuna fly again !</br></br>"Tsuyoku naritai !" to negau koto de,</br>Furueteta hane wa yami wo kirisaiteku</br>Kimi ga iru kara, mou kowakunai yo.</br>Sono te nigitte</br></br>"Yowasa datte kimi no tsuyosa" to,</br>Oshiete kureta kara boku wa mata tachiagareta !</br>Kimi no tame nara, donna itami mo</br>Koete koko kara, mou ichido ano sora e !</br>

song.title: Cerulean
song.lyrics: "Genkai nante nai" "zettai nante nai"</br>"Genkai nante nai" tte kimi no kotoba ni akogarete kono te wo nobashita nda</br>Zenkai dashite naite waratte mata kumori no nai sora no shita fumidasu no sa</br>Ano basho e !</br></br>Hajimari nante onaji de atsukunatta NAIFU ga bokura no mune wo tsurunuita</br>Ame no REESU no ue hashiri tsuzukete</br>Kizutsuite, ushinatte mo mada wasurerarenai kara</br></br>The skies are gray, but we're still showing off our faith !</br>Mou ki ni wa naranaide Blame to pain !</br>Uh tsukamitoru no sa eikou !</br>Sono HAATO ni Flame on !</br></br>"Zettai nai" tte kotoba ni</br>Sakara tte chikatta yume e to kono te wo nobashiteru nda</br>Seikai nante mou nakutatte kotae wa bokura no mune no naka ni aru</br>Futtou shita moete tsukamu nda !</br></br>"Genkai nante nai"</br>

song.title: Just Fly Away
song.lyrics: Kaze wo matsu tsubasa ga machikirezu kakedasu</br>Boku-tachi wo terashita itetsuita taiyou wo</br></br>Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh genkai nante</br>Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh suteteyuku nda</br>Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh kodoku ni nante kowasenai</br></br>Owaresenai yume no saki</br>Owarenai mirai darou ?</br>Shinjite miro jibun dake ni dekiru koto wo</br>Hitotsu dake tsukamu nara</br>Mayowazu ni erabu darou</br>Kizuna dake wo tsukamitoru nda honnou</br>Hatenaki sora tobitate ima Fly away</br>

song.title: Raise Your Flag
song.lyrics: Raise your flag</br>Koe no kagiri</br>Koe no kagiri</br>Koe no kagiri sakende</br></br>Kitto itsuka</br>Itsuka dokoka</br>Yume wo mitsuzuke samayou</br></br>Under pressure you are waiting for direction</br>Going on the road without your mind</br></br>All misleads they give ignoring our decisions</br>Killing yourself your soul we have inside</br></br>Agaki tsuzuke taore kujike</br>Haiagatte hashiri tsuzukete</br></br>Owari naki</br>Yume no ma to ma</br>We can struggle and muzzle the world before it fades away</br></br>Raise your flag</br>Koe no kagiri</br>Koe no kagiri</br>Koe no kagiri sakende</br></br>Kitto itsuka</br>Itsuka dokoka</br>Tadoritsuku to shinjite</br></br>Come on and raise your flag</br>So just raise your flag</br>Nando kujike mayoedo</br></br>Iki no kagiri</br>Tsuzuku kagiri</br>Yume wo mitsuzuke samayou</br>

song.title: Survivor
song.lyrics: Mawari mawatte saa ima kasanariatta mirai</br>We are saigo no SABAIBAA</br></br>Dou ni ka narisou da yo gisou shita risou shisou</br>Dou ni ka shitekure yo busou shita yabou kibou</br></br>Kikai no you na yatsura ni shihai sareru mae ni ibasho wo sagase yo !</br></br>Mawari mawatte saa ima kasanari-atta mirai</br>Te wo tori-atte bokura chi wo hai tachimukau yo</br>Mawari mawatte saa ima sora ni hanatta negai</br>Makete tamaru ka !</br>Yagate kanatta yume wo</br>Mamoritsuzukeru kara</br>We are saigo no SABAIBAA</br>
